Detailed Description

Type define of an IP packet header.

Field Documentation

IP_Address_t IP_Header_t::DestinationAddress

Destination protocol IP address of the packet

unsigned int IP_Header_t::Flags

Fragment flags, to indicate if a packet is fragmented

Offset of this IP fragment

uint16_t IP_Header_t::HeaderChecksum

Ethernet checksum of the IP header

unsigned char IP_Header_t::HeaderLength

Total length of the packet header, in 4-byte blocks

Identification value for identifying fragmented packets

Encapsulated protocol type

Source protocol IP address of the packet

uint16_t IP_Header_t::TotalLength

Total length of the IP packet, in bytes

uint8_t IP_Header_t::TTL

Maximum allowable number of hops to reach the packet destination

Special service type identifier, indicating delay/throughput/reliability levels

IP protocol version
